content.body: can anyone confirm... when `%TypedArray%.prototype.set` was changed to not check detached every loop iteration, it seems to have let that fall through to Get/SetValueInBuffer, which immediately does `Assert: IsDetached(ta) is false`, so we're hitting a spec assertion there now?
